festival.introText: Get ready for the return of the immense sunshine-filled Southern Sunset Festival in 2023. Blue skies, warm sunsets, top line-up, we’ve got it all. The only thing missing? You, and your mates! Located in The Oval, the largest outdoor event space in the area, you’ll be a short walk from Hastings mainline station with direct links to London and Brighton.
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Southern Sunset Festival 2023. Get Southern Sunset Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com.

faqs.question: When is Southern Sunset Festival 2023?
faqs.answer: Southern Sunset Festival comes to The Oval in Hastings on Sunday 30th July 2023.

faqs.question: What happens If I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer:
Unfortunately, we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent.

Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: How do I get to Southern Sunset?
faqs.answer:
Directions to The Oval (Hastings) with public transport

The following transport lines have routes that pass near The Oval

Bus: 

100, 101, 304, 99

Train Train: 

SOUTHERN

Walk:

 

Approx 13 minute walk from Hastings Train Station

faqs.question: Is there disability access?
faqs.answer:
Please contact Southern Sunset Festival on: hello@jbmmusic.com

 

or message them on their Facebook with any Disability Access Queries

faqs.question: Where is Southern Sunset Festival?
faqs.answer: Southern Sunset Festival is located at The Oval which is a large outdoor event space in Hastings and just a short walk away from the mainline station. The postcode for the venue is TN34 1EU.

faqs.question: What do VIP tickets include?
faqs.answer: VIP tickets include access to VIP area, VIP toilets & bar and queue jump.

faqs.question: Does Southern Sunset Festival have onsite camping?
faqs.answer: No, Southern Sunset Festival is a non camping festival so camping equipment is not needed. It is however close to the Hastings so there is plenty of alternative accommodation to choose from.

faqs.question: How do I get toSouthern Sunset Festival?
faqs.answer:
By Car - The Oval is on the A21 but has limited/no parking available so you are encouraged to use public transport where possible.
By Rail - Hastings Railway Station is a 20-minute walk from the site. 
By Bus - Bus routes 99, 101, 100 and 24 all run past the event site.

faqs.question: DoesSouthern Sunset Festival have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: Yes, you must be 18 or over to attend Southern Sunset Festival.
